name: "Whose Line" Fractures Quiz | TV Wordplay | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Duh rue carry

Who is the host of "Whose Line", which is fractured above?
questions.explanation:
Drew Carey.

	Drew Carey is the host behind the desk on the popular improv television show "Whose Line Is It Anyway?"  He also has shows called "The Drew Carey Show" and "Drew Carey's Improv-a-Ganza" (which is extremely similar to "Whose Line").  He is often the guy who is teased about his weight, his glasses, and his hosting.

questions.text:
Rhine styles

Which regular cast member of "Whose Line" is fractured here?
questions.explanation:
Ryan Stiles.

	Ryan Stiles appeared in every episode of "Whose Line" in America, as well as in Britain.  He is often the butt of all tall jokes, big nose jokes, and ugly shoe jokes.  Ryan Stiles is also on "The Drew Carey Show" and "Drew Carey's Improv-a-Ganza".

questions.text:
Call-in mockery

Who is the fractured "Whose Line" cast member above?
questions.explanation:
Colin Mochrie.

	Colin Mochrie is a regular cast member who had appeared in every episode of the American version of "Whose Line" as well as most of the episodes in Britain.  He also appears on "Drew Carey's Improv-a-Ganza".

questions.text:
Wane braid dee

Which fractured cast member of "Whose Line" is above?
questions.explanation:
Wayne Brady.

	Wayne Brady is one of the cast members of "Whose Line" who also hosted "Don't Forget the Lyrics" and "Let's Make a Deal".  He also appeared on "Drew Carey's Improv-a-Ganza".  He often uses the fact that he is black in many of his jokes (e.g. calling himself the "chocolate" and Chip Esten the "chip").

questions.text:
Brrr add sure would

Who is the cast member of "Whose Line" who is fractured here?
questions.explanation:
Brad Sherwood.

	Brad Sherwood often appears on "Whose Line" as the guy who has to choose a bachelor or as the host of a party.  He is also one of the members who is chosen to do some of the singing skits with Wayne.

questions.text:
Ship past tin

Who appears on "Whose Line" and is fractured above?
questions.explanation:
Chip Esten.

	Chip Esten appears on many episodes of "Whose Line".  He is good at the singing skits, so often plays in "Greatest Hits" or "Song Styles" with Wayne.

questions.text:
Gar egg purr oops!

Fractured here is which member of the "Whose Line" cast?
questions.explanation:
Greg Proops.

	Greg Proops always wears a suit and glasses when he appears on "Whose Line".  When he is on, he usually plays "Weird Newscasters" and "Let's Make a Date".

questions.text:
Chef day fuss

What cast member from "Whose Line" has been fractured?
questions.explanation:
Jeff Davis.

	Jeff Davis is one of the cast members who appears less often than the rest on "Whose Line".  He has messy black hair.  He usually partakes in the singing skits with Wayne.

questions.text:
Cat thee eager rain would

What female cast member of "Whose Line" has been fractured above?
questions.explanation:
Kathy Greenwood & Cathy Greenwood.

	Kathy Greenwood is one of only a few female cast members who appear on "Whose Line".  Usually, when she is on, she will be the one to choose bachelors on "Let's Make a Date", and she usually is a human prop on "Living Scenery".

questions.text:
Din knee seagull

What female cast member of "Whose Line" have I fractured above?
questions.explanation:
Denny Siegel.

	Denny Siegel is one of the least common cast members of "Whose Line".  But when she is on, she performs the female roles, giving Colin a nice break from the norm.
